meanings.definition: A subatomic particle with the same mass as a neutron but with opposite charge.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study antineutrons to understand their unique properties.
meanings.sent2: In the lab, researchers observed the behavior of antineutrons closely.
meanings.sent3: The antineutrons at the particle party were the life of the nucleus!
meanings.sent4: The concept of antineutrons is like a mirror image of regular neutrons.
meanings.sent5: Imagine antineutrons as the yin to the neutron's yang, balancing the subatomic world.
